results.name: A Game You Can Afford In This Economy (itch)
Dead Cells: Medley of Pain Bundle
Dead Cells: Return to Castlevania Bundle

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Leaderboard features require an internet connection and a Email, Username and Password
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Leaderboard features require an internet connection and a Email, Username and Password

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: This game uses OpenXR which technically should work with any VR controllers through SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: This runs on a Quest, so it should probably run on any reasonable computer that can run Oculus or SteamVR at all that isn't literally a toaster. However, for the PC version you have some more graphics options.
